items.headline: Translating Product Strategy into Product Roadmap for Enterprise Products
objectives_summary: Translating Product Strategy into Product Roadmap for accomplishing product objectives.
Why it is essential to build a Product Roadmap on a foundation of Product Vision, and Product Strategy
How to accomplish product discovery - Discovery of both market and customer needs

items.title: Introduction to Public Administration
items.headline: Public Administration is like any other administration which is carried out in public interest.
objectives_summary: Explain What is Public Administration
Define Public Administration
Differentiate between Public and Private Administration

items.title: The Bridge of Culture Development & Employee Engagement

visible_instructors.job_title: The Culture Development & Employee Engagement Queen!
visible_instructors.title: Angelique Vuilleumier
visible_instructors.name: Angelique

items.headline: Employee Engagement Strategies; Improve Employee Engagement; Organizational Leadership; Organizational Culture Change
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, students will be able to understand a complete model of what culture looks like inside of an organization.
Students will be able to diagnose their current culture and identify a desired culture.
Students will know how to create or tweak an organization's mission, vision, core values, and goals.

items.title: Executive Strategy & Management
items.headline: Project Management
objectives_summary: •	Develop strategies that can be implemented in real-world scenarios with visible improvements in business outcomes
•	Possess the necessary knowledge of implementing the developed strategies and putting them into action
•	Effectively managing a team and maximizing the output of each team member

items.title: Lean Management A-Z for Business and Project Management

visible_instructors.job_title: Lean Six Sigma and Quality Assurance Specialist
visible_instructors.title: Gunjan Subedi
visible_instructors.name: Gunjan

items.headline: Mastercourse over 20 lean management tools with Minitab Excel Case Studies Templates and 10 problem solving scenarios
objectives_summary: Introduces yourself with 20 lean tools for your business and productivity (Kaizen, 5S, 3M (Muda, Mura and Muri), Work Standardization, Value Stream Mapping, Pull System, Kanban, Key Performance Indicators,Overall Equipment Effectiveness,Root Cause Analysis, Single Minute Exchange of Dies, Andon,Heijunka,PDCA,A3 Report,Mistake Proofing or Poka Yoke,TAKT Time,Six Big Losses,JIDOKA (Automation),Setting Smart Goals,Policy Deployment (Hosin Kanri))
What is lean and how can organisations benefit from lean?
Tools and techniques of Lean management.

items.headline: CQIA Exam Preparation Course | All you need to become an active member of an improvement project team
objectives_summary: Successfully pass the Certified Quality Improvement Associate (CQIA) exam in the first attempt (confidently).
Implement the proven quality management and quality improvement principles in your work areas.
This course will provide you with the foundational quality improvement tools needed to a part of an improvement project.
